value.title: MLCommons debuts with public 86,000-hour speech data set for AI researchers

value.title: Google widely criticized after parting ways with a leading voice in AI ethics
value.excerpt: Many Google employees and others in the tech and academic communities are furious over the sudden exit from Google of a pioneer in the study of ethics in artificial intelligence—a departure they see as a failure by an industry titan to foster an environment supportive of diversity.

value.title: AI Weekly: In firing Timnit Gebru, Google puts commercial interests ahead of ethics
value.excerpt: With the firing of Timnit Gebru this week, Google implicitly signaled that it's willing to put commercial interests ahead of all else.

value.title: The opportunities with AI and machine learning

value.title: Darktrace Says Its AI Can Be Used for Performance Monitoring

value.title: Google Scientist’s Abrupt Exit Exposes Rift in Prominent AI Unit
value.excerpt: Google’s decision to part ways with a prominent researcher laid bare divisions within the company’s artificial intelligence unit and subjected its leader, the lauded software engineer Jeff Dean, to widespread scorn.
